description:
Though Bludgeon and his rogue cult of Decepticons have been defeated, the newly re-enervated Thunderwing remains active, returning from his devastating rampage on Nebulos with Cybertron locked firmly in his sights once more. There, Optmus Prime and the Wreckers brace for impact, unaware that Megatron has his own doomsday scenario in the work, and the clock is running...

Out of control, acting on pure, devastating instinct, THUNDERWING descends once again on CYBERTRON, with only a skeleton force of Autobots under the command of OPTIMUS PRIME to oppose him. While JETFIRE searches frantically for options, uncovering more mysteries in the process, the countdown to the total destruction of CYBERTRON continues. The line has been drawn, and-one way or another-it all ends here.
name: Stormbringer Part 4
Fish Serial Killer
Learn to Fly in 24 Easy Pages

description:
Superstar heroes Ebony and Ivory's first live broadcast mission was a complete success - almost. The Retribution industry is at its height of popularity. New mercenary/security/whatever-you-need-for-hire teams are popping up everyday. But as Justice-For-Hire, Inc. carries on with business as usual, another competitor arises, The Acela Fight Team. And with the recent addition of Esaya, a young master of the martial arts, they could be unstoppable!

The first comic book series in history to be released with live MMA action DVD content in every issue, now you can watch the characters from the comic battle in award-winning martial arts fight sequences on YouTube.
name: Enter the Dragon

description: While Joshua Rose's body lies in a coma, victim of a massive stroke, his wandering consciousness encounters a benevolent, ethereal entity he names Mercy. Pursuing the mysterious being around the globe, Rose watches as she touches the lives of anguished individuals, darkened by the shadow of despair, ignored by all but the enigmatic Mercy. In England, she defends a suburban family against a wrathful poltergeist. In a South American rain forest, she aids a young boy through a harrowing rite of passage. In Brooklyn, she inspires an elderly woman trapped by memories of the past and fears for the future. Driven to uncover Mercy's secrets, Joshua's quest for answers takes him to the brink of sanity. But what he learns will change him and his universe forever.
name: Mercy

description: An authoritarian government, an oppressed group of workers, the spark or rebellion is there and Megatron will be herald of freedom at any cost necessary.
name: Issue 1

description:
The European best-seller now finally presented in English! Writer Jean-Francois Di Giorgio and artist Frédéric Genêt tap into the rich mythology of the noble Samurai creating a nuanced look at the fabled Japanese warriors. Having become a samurai, Takeo feels strong enough to confront his past. On the borders of Japan a terrible plan is being plotted: General Akuma, one of the Empire's most influential figures, seems to be dead set on betraying the emperor to his own advantage. However, a grave secret links the two men: the 13th prophet. Meanwhile, Takeo hopes to discover who he is. Why did he grow up in a monastery ? And why was he abandoned by his brother ten years earlier? His quest will put him in deep torment, placing him in the middle of the dark destiny of the Empire and the 13th prophet!

Spoilers

Takeo sets forth in a quest to face his past, an on his journey he finds the world is just as twisted as he always thought.
name: The Heart of the Prophet

description: In the third chapter of this all-new Mirror Universe saga, we jump ahead to a never-before-seen period for the Mirror Universe: the waning days of the war between the Empire and the Klingon-Cardassian Alliance. As the Empire's sphere of influence shrinks with every losing battle, we ship out with the ISS Starbreaker, where a young navigator, Lieutenant Jean-Luc Picard, is forced into command of his crippled vessel, and must figure out a way to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat, or sparing that, at least keep himself and his remaining crewmates alive to fight another day.

"The Decider" - A brutal crime wave wrecks havoc upon the streets of Springfield, Massachusetts and all evidence points to the perpetrators as being giant, mutant turtles! Leo, Don, Raph, Mike, Casey Jones and Master Splinter struggle to solve the vicious robberies and find the real mastermind behind them before the TMNT are revealed by the local media!
name: The Decider!

description: In Los Angeles, 14-year-old Sarah Becker disappears into thin air. Ex-cop John Zandt and FBI agent Nina Black are on the trail of Sarah's abductor, a man that Zandt has a terrible history with, a sadistic killer known only as The Upright Man. In Montana, former CIA agent Ward Hopkins tries to uncover the mystery behind his parent's death. Seemingly unconnected incidents happen hundreds of miles from each other. Soon Ward, Nina and Zandt will learn that all roads lead to The Straw Men!
name: Chapter Two

description: Ray hasn't been taking his medication. No surprises there. Turns out the Hoxford staff don't really have the prisoners welfare at heart... more like their own stomachs. Dr Ainley keeps trying to gain access to her old patients, only to find herself locked in the Warden's office with a strange old man as night falls, the full moon lights the sky... and the screaming begins.' Eisner-nominated writer/artist Ben Templesmith (Wormwood Gentleman Corpse) offers up two bloody good covers to go along with chapter two of his latest opus.

Sci Fi's Galactica series writer Seamus Kevin Fahey - joined this issue by co-writer Clay Carmouche - is back and joined by artist Jonathan Lau for a special "origin" series focusing on Kara and Helo! From the academy to their assignment onboard the Galactica, follow the previously untold tale in Dynamite's "Origin" series! Featuring two covers, one by Lau and the other a BSG Photo Cover!
name: Starbuck & Helo: Part 1 of 3

description: Amos Fortune believes winning is mostly a matter of luck – and he's going to make his own from now on! But the Super Friends bet it takes skill to win. Who's right? Plus, puzzles, games and more!
name: Just My Luck

description: In the conclusion to Niles and Wrightson's horror-noir, Coogan has reached the end of the line, and there's no question whether or not he'll survive to see it through... not when he's already dead! But dying is the least of his worries now that there are giant ants running amok!

You thought you had trouble going on a trip? Imagine being the Fallen Angel, her son Jude, and Black Mariah, trying to get to the fabled City of Life, stuck in the middle of the ocean with sharks converging and no land in sight. Just having to deal with lost luggage doesn't seem so bad now, does it?

While corrupt senators hoard profits from State energy supplies, the growing numbers of unemployed cannot even find the means by which even fuel themselves.

When the Senate elects to automate yet another off-planet mine and make all employees redundant, the betrayed miners rebel. The security forces come down hard. The result - a massacre. Key workers are held responsible. En route to prison, they make a desperate bit for freedom by commandeering their shuttercraft and fleeing to one the most troubled population centers in all the city-states - Kaon - a place where life has no value and death sometimes a price...

Overview
If she's going to slaughter Gustav, swordswoman Karula first must defeat . . . Minerva! It's warrior princess against warrior princess, and blood will fly! Meanwhile, Rosalia is saved from heavily armed rapists by the love-struck guardswoman she seduced while escaping Kurgh's flying fortress.
name: The Revenge of Gustav (Part 4 of 6)

description:
Overview
Karula and Masahiko have infiltrated the brutal slave city of Radom at last. Their daring rescue would certainly have failed if not for Karula's old friend, Chen, but there's no time for back-patting now. . . there's a king to assassinate. Emperor Gustav has arrived in Radom, and Princess Minerva is on hand herself to make sure no one harms her father. Can the companions break through Minerva's guard to kill the emperor?
name: The Revenge of Gustav (Part 5 of 6)

description:
Overview
Masahiko's a hero! His Kamikaze airbike ride sets off huge fires in the mines of Radom. Together with the workers' revolt, Emperor Gustav's visit has turned into a nightmare for the Romunilian leader. Even Kurgh, the Romunilian Supreme Warlock General, has failed to deliver on his promise to kill Princess Karula. But that doesn't mean Karula's in hiding. Far from it! Dard at her side, the Ledomiam princess emerges from the flames to take Gustav's life. But is she prepared to pay the price of her Faustian deal with the treacherous Kurgh?
name: The Revenge of Gustav (Part 6 of 6)

description:
Overview
Romunilian Supreme Warlock General Kurgh thinks he can control Princess Karula. He better think again. The Warrior Princess has tricks of her own up her sleeve, and Kurgh's magical sword in her hands. Their confrontation may reduce Radom to rubble. Meanwhile, Karula's sister Rosalia and her lover aren't sure if they're on the run or on a honeymoon. But when Romunilian stormtroopers find them, their tryst gets wilder than either of them expected.
name: Shadow of the Warlock (Part 1 of 6)

description:
Overview
Karula and companions are all safe and sound in the free state of Akogiland, a trade city built on an enormous floating continent. The princess and Dard have a loving reunion. It's a picture-perfect, happy ending, except . . . Who is that sleeping in Dard's tent but Minerva, the beautiful and buxom daughter of Emperor Gustav?! What's going on here, lover boy?!
name: Shadow of the Warlock (Part 2 of 6)

description:
Overview
I come not to praise Gustav, but to bury him. So might Kurgh say as the Warlock General announces that he's the best choice to become the new Emperor of Romunilia. Only one warlord is brave enough to oppose him, Kreitas, defender of the missing Princess Minerva. Little does Kreitas know, as he fights off Kurgh's assassins, that the princess he worships from afar is alive and well.
name: Shadow of the Warlock (Part 3 of 6)

description:
Overview
Rosalia and Rua have been wandering the wilds since their escape from Kurgh's flying fortress. So no wonder they're overjoyed when they spot an inviting desert oasis. With their spirits refreshed, the insatiable Rua figures it's time for a little fun with her friend. But fun turns to fear when they're surrounded by Imperial soldiers. The women and the Imperials have forgotten that in this arid country, oasis lakes are often the home of giant sand crabs that don't like to be disturbed! Meanwhile, Princess Minerva is set on vengeance against Kurgh. But when Imperial fighters appear off their wing, the captain of her transport aircraft decides to sell her out.
name: Shadow of the Warlock (Part 4 of 6)

description:
Overview
Admiral Gillion of Romunilia has come to Akogiland in search of Karula and Princess Minerva. And the arrival of a deadly battleship off their floating city causes disarray in the ranks of revolutionaries, merchants, and downright criminals that throng it's streets. The chairman of the council says he's ready to fight. But can Karula stand by and let the city that has protected her be bombarded to ruins?
name: Shadow of the Warlock (Part 5 of 6)

description:
Overview
Admiral Gillion has ordered his powerful battleship to bombard the free trading city of Akogiland, and Karula is in charge of organizing the defense! Can the floating city's motley collection of old cannons and artillery hold off a Romunilian ship of the line? It's boarding parties away as Akogiland strikes the first blow of rebellion against the Empire, and its brutal new emperor, Kurgh!
name: Shadow of the Warlock (Part 6 of 6)

description:
Overview
Far behind enemy lines, Princess Minerva is fighting a lonely war against the sorcerer who betrayed her father. Deep in the ruins of a devastated city, the angry princess is troubled by memories of her happy days on Akogihold with Dard and Karula, the woman she swore to kill. And at the same time, she's being hunted by a whole legion of empire troops!
name: The Hidden War (Part 1 of 6)

description:
Overview
Kreitas has rescued his princess. But Princess Minerva doesn't suffer fools and traitors easily, and now the young warrior holds him responsible for the treachery of his older brother. Meanwhile, it's not love, but greed and lust, that's filling the underworld of Akogiland as mercenaries stream into the rebel stronghold from across the continent.
name: The Hidden War (Part 2 of 6)

description:
Overview
As war clouds near Akogiland, Karula and Dard enjoy a few days of peace. Not that everyone else is enjoying their fun as much as they are. This is one couple that no one can ignore. No one, except Masahiko, their Nosjir friend. Masahiko is in heaven as warplanes arrive to join the rebellion. And when he stumbles across a famous flying ace, Ramuda sets the wheels in motion that will bring another comrade into Karula's circle.
name: The Hidden War (Part 3 of 6)

description:
Overview
Far from Akogiland, Kreitas, the last loyal retainer of Princess Minerva, is struggling to make his dream come true. The more he tries to please the Princess, the more he seems to anger her. Even the friendly Rufus can't seem to persuade Minerva to accept Kreitas' loyalty. Meanwhile, Karula wants the rebels to mass all their forces for a single strike right at Kurgh's fortress castle itself.
name: The Hidden War (Part 5 of 6)

description:
Overview
The imperial forces of Kurgh are closing in on Akogiland and only the intervention of Queen Rosalia has brought order to the sessions of the council. Even a squadron of Nosjir pilots has joined the anti-imperial alliance, and Masahiko has been dragged back into the service. Karula has a bold plan for taking the war right to Kurgh's front door, but will any of the comrades come out unscathed?
name: The Hidden War (Part 6 of 6)

description:
The troubled city of Kaon is a place without hope but with an excess of suffering. An illegal underground fighting circuit grows in scale and notoriety. Fighters with empty tanks gather at secret locations, certain that they will earn release from their miserable lives; they will receive fuel and fame - or death. At the dark heart of the violent spectacle stands the sport's rising star: Megatron.

In this time of instability it is Sentinel Prime himself that leads Kaon's security forces. His team - motivated. His reputation - uncompromising. His orders - burn out this cancer before it spreads.

It won't be easy.

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

name: Kakuage (Promotion)

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description: Shockwave is a Decepticion, but he serves only one true master: Pure Logic. But it all fails when you're facing the anarchy, rage and wrath of the Dinobots and the taste of their revenge. This is the turning point for Shockwave, face defeat or embrace evolution.

What ever happened to Sela? Sacrificing herself so that an innocent life might be spared, she was sent to an icy grave by Belinda. But is she gone for good? The classic story of 'Rip Van Winkle' sheds some light on Sela's fate and offers intriguing clues on what's to come in the Grimm universe. You simply can't afford to miss this revealing issue of one of the hottest independent titles in comics!
name: Rip Van Winkle

description: Introducing the ICONS OF EVIL series, revealing key chapters in the lives of He-Man's most fearsome foes! How did a once great ruler of all the oceans become the lowly servant that we know today? Dive into Mer-Man's tragic past and experience his fall from grace as the creators of Tech Jacket spin an epic standalone story!
name: Mer-Man

volume.name: Masters of the Universe, Icons of Evil: Mer-Man

description: "Mined Games" - Mr. Braunze is back on the scene and we discover what happened in the Nevada desert back in TMNT Volume Two!
name: Mined Games

description: Trapped in a crumbling church, Hellboy must save a man's soul from ancient witches, a rain of exploding corpses, and finally the evil magic of Crooked Man himself. This three-issue series reunites Mignola and legendary horror artist Richard Corben (The Bodyssey, Banner, Punisher: The End, Hellboy: Makoma) in a tale of witchcraft rooted in Appalachian folklore.
name: The Crooked Man (Part 3)

description:
Overview

Bruce Campbell . . . Man. Hero. Legend. There isn't a challenge that Bruce can't face and conquer. Which is why he was kidnapped and brought to the town of Gold Lick to help defeat a Chinese demon by the name of Guan-Di. Unfortunately Bruce doesn't know that he's not just in another monster movie--Guan-Di is REAL! Now Bruce Campbell is in for the fight of his life!

Don't miss out on this one-shot companion to the upcoming indy film My Name is Bruce staring the one and only BRUCE CAMPBELL!
name: My Name Is Bruce

description:
Overview
Following the tradition of Tex Avery's classic 1940s animation, Dark Horse launches a miniseries featuring America's favorite pooch, Droopy Dog! In "Dr. Droopenstein," Droopy needs a brain to bring his creation to life, and has a chance to get one when Wolfie's car breaks down nearby. But the Wolf ain't so happy to give up his smarts, and does all he can to escape Castle Droopenstein!

As a bonus, that "wacky" rodent Screwball Squirrel returns in "The Violent Zone," an Avery-style parody of that favorite 1950s classic sci-fi television show. Rod Serling never had it so tough!
name: Dr. Droopenstein

description:
Pursued by an unlikely individual, the rabbit ronin Usagi goes on a hunt for the truth, only to discover something more shocking than he ever imagined!

People tend to ignore the homeless and destitute, but not Usagi--especially when he discovers the same beggar in every town to which he travels! Curious, Usagi begins a search to uncover the mendicant's identity. Little does he know, the Neko Ninja Clan is after the beggar as well. Indeed, there is more to this figure than meets the eye, but no one would guess that the mystery leads all the way to the Shogun!
name: The Beggar

description:
Overview
Following the tradition of Tex Avery's classic 1940s animation, Dark Horse serves up more of the world's most convivial cur, Droopy Dog! In "Turkey for Dinner," Droopy and Spike enter a contest to see who can bring the best-dressed turkey home for Thanksgiving dinner. But capturing a plump, juicy piece of poultry isn't as easy as it seems when the only turkey Spike and Droopy can find is a scrawny-looking, smart-mouthed bird who does everything it can to avoid capture!

As a bonus, Wolfie Wolf and Ravishing Red return in "Pretty Present," a Yuletide tale where Wolfie's hired as a department-store Santa to make the local children happy. But when the boss' beautiful daughter takes over as Wolfie's assistant elf, Wolfie gets so distracted that the store quickly becomes a disaster area!
name: Turkey for Dinner

description:
Overview
Following in the tradition of Tex Avery's classic 1940s animation, Dark Horse concludes its three-issue showcase of the adventures of the world's most congenial canine, Droopy Dog!

In "Santa's Little Helpers," ol' Saint Nick has to decide which of his two elves, Droopy or Spike, will accompany him on his annual sleigh ride! Both boys learn in short order that trying to fool Father Christmas will result in something nasty being left in your stocking!

In the bonus back-up, Meathead attends the Okee-Dokee Data School in hopes of working with computers! And everything is going by the book until that rascally rodent Screwball Squirrel enrolls! His assignment? Give Meathead a one-way "re-boot" up the corporate ladder!
name: Santa's Little Helper

description:
A few of the most famousest funnymen in film and television join forces with comics' best and brightest to bring you a hilarious new perspective on the world of Eric Powell's The Goon, in this new three-part, black-and-white anthology series.

In this issue, humor expert Patton Oswalt (Comedy Central's Comedians of Comedy and Mr. Show) who's no stranger to comics (Bizarro Comics, JLA), scribes a short story of Goon's sidekick Franky, while legendary artist Mike Ploog (Werewolf by Night, Ghost Rider) provides the art.

And that's just fer starters! Also included is a gooey helping of other short stories by the likes of Steve Niles and Ryan Sook, Bongo Comics' own Bill Morrison, and the first in a string of serialized shorts from series creator Eric Powell and frequent co-conspirators Tom Sniegoski and Mark Farmer.

That's right kids, akters from the tee vee box and all yer favorite funny book creators! It's The Goon like you've never seen it!

Fire and brimstone coming down from the skies! The dead rising from the grave! Human sacrifice, dogs and cats living together-mass hysteria! It must be the end of days as Dwight T. Albatross takes on his own Goonanthology series!

The first issue brought you the stylings of actor/comedian Patton Oswalt teamed with the legendary Mike Ploog. The second issue follows suit, teaming comedian Brian Posehn (also from Comedy Central's Comedians of Comedy and Mr. Show) with hotshot horror artist and rising-star Tony Moore (The Walking Dead, The Exterminators, Fear Agent) But that's not all! This issue also brings you a hilarious Dean Martin-style celebrity roast of the Goon, written by B.P.R.D.'s own John Arcudi with the sleek and edgy line-work of the great Kevin Nowlan, also a brilliantly dark and funny short from the mind of Hilary Barta. Meanwhile Powell, Sniegoski, and Farmer bring us part two of their three-part serial "Peg Leg Full of Heaven" featuring the Little Unholy Bastards.

The final issue of this anthology miniseries goes out with a bang as comics and Hollywood stars alike unite for one last romp through the world of Eric Powell's The Goon.

The issue begins with the return of Powell's pal, co-creator of the Comedy Central hit show Reno: 911!Thomas Lennon to the comics scene, teamed up with B.P.R.D. artist-extraordinaire Guy Davis! Further stories come from Arvid Nelson, creator of Dark Horse's newest horror title Rex Mundi, along side Humberto Ramos, hot off the heels of his debut on Marvel's Wolverine and co-creator of the Dark Horse miniseries. Revelations; as well as a very special appearance by British indie artist Roger Langridge, creator of the critically acclaimed Fred the Clown! And as a special bonus, Dark Horse's own intrepid editor Scott Allie also brings to life his own little corner of The Goon universe with the help of Jefferson Street Studio-mate Todd Herman, as they examine the life of one of the book's most underrated heroes, Willy Nagel.

OverviewWhat do you do when your husband shows up at your front door, dies, and then comes back to life and starts chasing you around? You call Dylan Dog -- Nightmare Investigator! Join Dylan in this horrific, action-packed first issue as he battles zombies who are terrorizing a small Scottish town. Featuring a cover by Mike Mignola.

Overview

This issue of Legacy launches the final four-issue chapter of "Vector." This galaxy-changing force has moved through three time periods, beginning over 4,000 years ago. Lasting impressions and repercussions have been left on all the heroes of Star Wars. Now, "Vector" has reached the future of Star Wars and will forever change the lives of Skywalker's descendants!

For anyone who never knew where to start with Star Wars comics, "Vector" is the perfect introduction to the entire Star Wars line! For any serious Star Wars fan, "Vector" is the must-see event of 2008, with major happenings throughout the most important moments of the galaxy's history!

* This issue launches the final chapter of "Vector," a 12-part storyline that has run through every Star Wars title, from Knights of the Old Republic, to Dark Times, to Rebellion, and now to Legacy.
name: Vector, Part Nine

description:
Overview

Robert E. Howard's vengeance-obsessed puritan begins his supernatural adventures in the haunted Black Forest of Germany in this five-issue adaptation of Howard's "The Castle of the Devil."

When Solomon Kane stumbles upon the body of a boy hanged from a rickety gallows, he goes after the man responsible--a baron feared by the peasants from miles around. Something far worse than the devilish baron or the terrible, intelligent wolf that prowls the woods lies hidden in the ruined monastery beneath the baron's castle, where a devil-worshipping priest died in chains centuries ago.

Dark Horse's original Conan editor, Scott Allie, writes the series, with art by Mario Guevara and Dave Stewart, who reinvents his revolutionary color technique from Conan.
name: The Castle of the Devil, Part 1

description: Youngblood is dead! Long live Youngblood! Introducing the all-new, all-different lineup - and they're more than ready for their fifteen minutes of fame! But how did this personnel shift take place? And will the viewing public actually stand for it? Meanwhile, the Televillain makes his violent return - and this time he's rockin' the power of Tivo!
name: Chapter 5

description: The final chapter of the epic "Death of Captain America" saga is here! The New Captain America, the Falcon, the Black Widow, Sharon Carter - all in a final showdown with the Red Skull and his minions for the future of America!
name: The Man Who Bought America: Part Six

description:
X-Force is still reeling from the aftermath of their first mission, but there’s no rest for the wicked. Mutantkind’s enemies have multiplied, but Cyclops has a new target for his black-ops team... and even X-Force doesn’t believe who they’re going after next.
Rahne (Wolfsbane) is still coping with the death of her long time tormentor Reverend Craig and also still afflicted by the mind subversion. As the team attempts to test  Wolfsbane's reaction to Angel and his newly regrown  feather wings, Rahne becomes enraged and attacks Angel.  Triggering a reaction in Angel and changing him back into the Forth Horseman, Archangel.
    Wolverine tackles Rahne holding her down as she roars out  "KILL THE ANGel ...TAKE HIS WINGS".  In the process of fleeing  Archangel realizes his attacker's identity and comes back to confront his attacker.  He knows she was the one that took his wings and demands revenge.  Cyclops leaps into action grab Archangel and begins to talk him down.  Allowing Warren to regain control. 

    Superstar artists MIKE CHOI and SONIA OBACK are on board as one of the X-Men’s oldest foes returns!
name: Old Ghosts, Part 1 of 4

description: Computer chaos hits New Metropolis, crippling the high-tech city and throwing the Legion into the Dark Ages as communications crash, starships collide and magic takes over! Brainiac 5 has to prove that science is stronger than sorcery...but will he have to give up his place in the Legion to do it?
name: Failure to Communicate

volume.name: Legion of Super-Heroes in the 31st Century

description: Spectra Phantasms  have invaded our world. These ghostly creatures from another dimension occupy the human brain and endow their host with spectacular paranormal abilities. Private investigator Gordon Watt, long-aware of the spectral phantasms, investigates a bizarre series of scissor murders. With the help of a powerful psychic named Jessica, Gordon soon discovers a connection between the phantasms and the mystery of a vengeful, undead boy named Bartholomew. But humanity faces a greater threat — the White Blob emerges from the abyss to colonize pockets of human society. Gordon and Jessica must enlist the help of Bartholomew and the hideous power of his Scissor Swarm or face assimilation by the growing colony of the White Blob!

FEATURING ART BY NEW REGULAR PENCILER, MIKE DEODATO, JR.! Wolverine’s days in the Weapon X program, his first encounter with The Incredible Hulk, his induction into the X-Men…it’s all here in the prologue to DARK DECEPTION, next month’s WOLVERINE: ORIGINS and X-MEN: LEGACY crossover!
name: Dark Deception: Prologue

description:
Nightbeat loves to solve mysteries, but when he faces a new kind of menace in Gorlam Prime, he will painfully discover that some things are meant to be shrouded in mystery.

The spotlight falls on NIGHTBEAT, as he investigates one of the greatest Cybertronian mysteries... the disappearance of the first Ark! However, some mysteries, it seems, are better left unsolved! Guest-starring... the MICROMASTERS?!

As the Wildcats attempt to rebuild their shattered world one piece at a time, a glimmer of hope is offered in a rumored oasis in the Nevada desert that literally sprang up out of nowhere after the Apocalypse. Could this be the fabled Nevada Garden? And what ex-member of StormWatch: PHD stands in the way of them finding out? Also, a new backup story begins focusing on Marc Slayton, the original Backlash, by writer Christos Gage and artist Mike McKone.
name: Eden, Part 1

description:
If the Skrulls have infiltrated us for years preparing for the INVASION, then what happened to them during the legendary HOUSE OF M event? Find out here in another huge chapter in the Secret Invasion story packed with shocking reveals. By Secret Invasion's Brian Michael Bendis and superstar artist Jim Cheung (Young Avengers).

Homage cover to House of M issue 1.
name: House Of M

description: It starts out with Hot Rod riding on a meteor which is heading towards a moon. He thinks about how people always tell him things are impossible and he always believes there’s a way to do anything. He eventually jumps off of the meteor and crashes onto the moon by himself and although he survives, he is badly damaged by the fall. Hot Rod then flashes back to a time on Ki-Aleta when he was first put in charge of a unit. They reach a place called the Omega bunker and devise a plan to distract the omega guardians, sneak into the bunker, and secure the magnificence – a map of everything in the universe. He then flashes back to his present situation where he is trying to break into Styx – the most brutal Decepticon penal colony. He uses a virus to create false alarms around the base, sending guards everywhere at certain times, allowing Hot Rod to get by undetected. As he tries to get to the Z-Lateral cell block, more memories of Ki-Aleta come up. They manage to distract the guardians and Hot Rod and Download are working to secure the magnificence but as they do, something goes wrong with the holograms distracting the guardians and they are detected and Download is killed by them. Back in the present, Hot Rod disguises himself with a hologram and gets to the Z-Lateral block and all the cell doors are opened by his virus. He tries not to think about anyone else he could rescue and focuses on saving one bot in particular – Dealer – who he abandoned back on Ki-Aleta. He remembers how back on Ki-Aleta, Dealer was under attack by Decepticons and was calling for help but Hot Rod had to ignore him to carry out the back-up plan made to secure the magnificence in case the main plan failed. Hot Rod finds Dealer alive but damaged in his cell and places a hologram on him to disguise him as well. Hot Rod then commandeers a ship and they use it to escape. When Dealer is fixed up, Hot Rod tries to apologize to Dealer but Dealer says it’s no problem and he understands why he did what he did. However, Dealer is later seen talking to Banzaitron about how he compromised the mission from the beginning and that Hot Rod is still unaware of that. Banzaitron is annoyed that they didn’t get what they wanted because Hot Rod still secured the magnificence but Dealer tells him that Hot Rod still feels guilty and feels as though he owes Dealer and that they can use that to get what they want. Banzaitron then decides to rename Dealer to Doubledealer.

Overview

Dylan befriends an unfortunate boy who seems to be the target of someone's rage. The poor child has been the victim of illegal amputations and transplants, obviously the unwilling donor to an ongoing series of operations. But the boy is mute, able to communicate only through his drawings. Can Dylan solve the mystery of the identity of the boy's tormentor, before it's too late?

Overview

Prostitutes are being murdered on the streets of London by a seemingly invisible killer and Dylan Dog has been hired to find this modern-day Jack the Ripper. But will Dylan be able to find the killer without becoming an unfortunate victim himself? Join Dylan Dog in this spine-tingling thriller!

Overview

Dylan Dog is called in to protect a woman who miraculously survived the murder of her entire family 16 years ago. Who the real killer is and who should be protected from whom is called into question as Dylan investigates further into the tragedy. And when he finds out the truth, it just might cost him his life.

Overview

For one young woman named Morgana it seems as if zombies have taken over the world. She needs help and it looks like there's only one man who can help her, Dylan Dog. Unfortunately she's having trouble finding Dylan and he's having trouble finding her. Will they get together before it's too late to solve this undead mystery?

Overview

It's After Hours in London. Dylan Dog is tired. He wants to go home. Unfortunately, it seems he is fated to wander the streets of London as one distraction after another keeps our hero from his beloved sleep. Will Dylan make it home? Will he ever be the same again?!

Deadpool's Weapon X past is explained, and how he became essentially something that was flushed down the toilet. He retaliates by burning the place to the ground. Deadpool joins up with the Skrulls to help them infiltrate earth. Skrull-Deadpools are cloned and Deadpool has the Skrullpools face off against the Super-Skrulls.
name: One of Us Part 2: One of Them

description: Wakanda is facing annihilation as King T'challa and Queen Ororo are being help prisoners by the skrulls. Facing torture and dishonor, the royal family show the skrulls what pride and love really means by not giving up to their demands. In the meantime, Wakandans are waiting the final blow sticking to their King's plan: Both sides can play with Deception.
name: See Wakanda And Die, Part 3

description:
As Nova and the Super Skrull reached Eatth, KI'rt fooled the rest of the skrull armada to give Nova some time to defend his home planet. After he heard a message that his brother could be in danger, he visited the Pegasus Labs only to find out that they were victims of several skrull attacks.

While defending the Labs, Richard Rider realized that there was a chance to bring back Worldmind but who really came back from the dead was someone less expected.
name: Brothers in Arms

description:
Superman, Batman and Wonder Woman lead the heroes of the DCU against the machinations of their malevolent counterparts, resulting in a cataclysmic event that will change the world-but not like anyone involved expects.

Finally, Morgaine Le Fey, Despero and Enigma see their plan successful but the result is a cataclysmic chain of events that could change the universe forever. Meanwhile, in a distant planet, Konvikt is rescued by Graak and they witnessed the end of time as they know it.
name: But So No Longer; Honor and Justice

description: Well, it's finally here, kids, the rainbow swirly conclusion of Tron. Jet Bradley's adventures in THE COMPUTER WORLD! have been amusing, fever-dream weird, and downright epic. What is the fate of THE COMPUTER WORLD!? Go find out -- Tron #6 by Landry Walker, Eric Jones, Michael Shoyket and the amazing coloring powers of GURU eFX is in stores now!

volume.name: Tron: The Ghost in the Machine

description:
New Judge Dredd story starts this issue by fill-in writer Robbie Morrison. Dredd and Psi-Judge Nova are sent in to space to track down alien criminal Lucifer Bloodstone, who has been preying on Mega-City One Starships.

Cover: Cliff Robinson (Judge Dredd)

  • Droid Life (Cat Sullivan)
  • Judge Dredd - Firestorm (part 1) (Robbie Morrison - Sam Hart)
  • The Red Seas - Old Gods (part 5) (Ian Edginton - Steve Yeowell)
  • A.B.C. Warriors - The Volgan War - Book Three (part 4) (Pat Mills - Clint Langley)
  • Stalag 666 (part 5) (Tony Lee - Jon Davis-Hunt)
  • Lobster Random - The Forget-Me-Knot (part 4) (Simon Spurrier - Carl Critchlow)
name: Prog 1604

description:
Camp Hammond has been taken as the Skrulls main HQ on Earth without the Initiative consent. Obviously, there will be retaliation and the Shadow Initiative will be the spearhead of the counterattack. But maybe the best weapon of these brave soldiers are nothing else that a coward, weaselly tiny man.

From Marvel.com:

Camp Hammond has been overrun, not just by the occupying Skrull army, but by the SKRULL QUEEN, herself! Well guess what? That's just what the SHADOW INITIATIVE wanted! Join MUTANT ZERO, TRAUMA, BENGAL, CONSTRICTOR, and ANT-MAN as they try this war's most dangerous mission: to take out the SKRULL-SPIDER-WOMAN! That IS why you stayed behind, right ANT-MAN? Also: As 3-D MAN and the KILL KREW carve a green, bloody swath across America, their numbers continue to grow. And in this issue, a classic AVENGER signs up-- and joins the AVENGERS: INITIATIVE ongoing cast!
name: Home Field Advantage

description: Bombshell is back! But wait — isn't she dead? Whatever the answer, one thing's for sure: the Teen Titans are gonna have their hands full! Also in this issue: Wonder Girl can feel something terrible on the horizon coming for her and there's nothing she can do to stop it!
name: Pawns and Kings Part 1: Preemptive Strike

description:
1. "Double X Means Double Death!" (Superman and Batman) written by Mike W. Barr, penciled by Rich Buckler, inked by Bob Smith, colored by Gene D'Angelo and lettered by Milt Snapinn.
  2. "Bedlam in the Big House" (Green Arrow) written by Mike W. Barr, penciled by Trevor Von Eeden, inked by Larry Mahlstedt, colored by Tom Ziuko and lettered by Pierre Bernard Jr.
  3. "No Title" (Zatanna) written by Paul Kupperberg, penciled and inked by Dan Spiegle, colored by Tom Ziuko and lettered by Adam Kubert.
  4. "Sting"-ing in the Rain!" (Hawkman) written by Bob Rozakis, penciled by Carmine Infantino, inked by Rodin Rodriguez, colored by Tom Ziuko and lettered by Todd Klein.
  5. "Magicians and Mercenaries" (Captain Marvel) written by E. Nelson Bridwell, penciled by Don Newton, inked by Dan Adkins, colored by Adrienne Roy and lettered by Pete Iro.
  6. "DC Profile #88 - Ted P. Skimmer" .
  7. "Daily Planet" Volume 81 Issue 17 for the month of November 1981 edited by Bob Rozakis, production by Jodi Saviuk and lettered by Typeset. Featuring all-new Doctor Fate stories as a backup feature in The Flash #306. Plus, the Justice Society of America's reprinted stories are featured in The Best of DC #21. Captain Carrot and the Zoo Crew are featured in a special free preview in The New Teen Titans #16.
  8. "Hembeck" by Fred Hembeck.

Notes:

  • 48 pages no ads.
  • The Joker and Two-Face cameos in the Superman-Batman story.
  • The Batcave under the Wayne Foundation Building is used.
  • Slingshot cameo (in prison garb) in Green Arrow story.
  • Makeshift Bow and Arrows used. The jail cell's cot rods became arrows, the mattress seam was used as the string and the bed provided parts for the bow.
  • To learn more about the amazing Ted P. Skimmer check out http://bobrozakis.blogspot.com/2009/09/ted-p-skimmer-and-me.html.
name: Double X Means Double Death! / Bedlam in the Big House / No Title / "Sting"-ing in the Rain! / Magicians and Mercenaries

description: An eons old wizard has finally found it...the tomb of the Mantikore...the universe's oldest, darkest power. Or has he? Enter Alex Crane, a slacker college student with a crappy job, and problems with his girlfriend. When Alex blunderingly releases an ancient evil, he'll have more to worry about than rent and his lovelife. KORE #1 introduces the title character and leads into the dark, fun and twsted world of KORE.
name: Lost in Abaddon, part one of five

description: After being smuggled from Earth to the strange new world of ABADDON, Alex finds that now is he not only a hulking monster, but also surrounded by bizarre creatures. Alex meets a small blue fairy named Molli, on the run from ogres, trolls, vampires and elves, who have one weird characteristic - they act more like common thugs and criminals than the fantastical creatures we know so well. As if that wasn't a big enough problem, the mysterious ARCHEAN wants him for himself, and has his own army of skilled warriors to catch him. Back home, Alex's girlfriend, Mandy, answers questions for the Chicago PD - Alex was last seen at the museum just minutes before it went up in smoke, and he's a prime suspect.
name: Kore #2

description: Alexander Crane is still reeling from his journey to the strange world of Abaddon, but the locals don't seem to be too sympathetic. Before long, he finds himself caught between a gang of vampire bikers, a small blue fairy with a real attitude problem, and a group of soldiers just like the ones who tracked him down on Earth. It doesn't take long for the local Dwarven Police Department to arrive to break up the squabble. Meanwhile, on Earth, we learn more about the bizarre team of rag tag magicians trying to stop the ARCHEAN from capturing Alex. If they're going to do so, one of their most powerful allies will have to go to Abaddon to stop him!
name: Kore #3

description: First there was an Ogre's farm filled with "evil" chickens, then a vampire motorcycle gang, and now Alexander Crane finds himself sleeping in a "Gentlemen's Club" for trolls and fairies. Thanks to Molli, a Sprite willing to offer sarcastic advice, Alex is able to at least hold on to his sanity, and learn about this strange world. Even the strongest of minds break down eventually, though, and Alex is hardly the strongest. It's only when he remembers that his Girlfriend, Mandy, is probably in danger thanks to him, that he pulls himself together and prepares to face the Archean head on. Little does he know that the very magicians that helped him on Earth have sent the deadly RAKSHASA to watch over her. This mysterious woman's role is to see that the Archean not use Mandy against Alex, even if it means KILLING her.
name: Kore #4

description: Alexander (Kore) Crane faces his hardest test yet when the Archean lures him back to Earth. If he doesn't obey the sinister wizard, his girlfriend Mandy will die, but if he does, the entire world will pay the price. Even the mighty Archean though, might not know what kind of evil he's facing against the power of the MANTIKORE.
name: Kore #5

description:
They were genetically engineered to be supra-human weapons of mass destruction, but now they must walk amongst the people they were created to destroy. Hip Flask and Ebony Hide count amongst their number: Elephantmen. Even when befriended by a small girl, Hide is still haunted by his past and is forced to recognize that suspicion and contempt will always be his constant companions.

Santa Monica 2259

A large humanoid creature stands in front of an adult themed restaurant smoking. He has the frame of a human but the head of an elephant and dressed in a shabby tan trenchcoat, shirt and tie. A small girl walks up and asks if he's allowed inside? because her mum says her dad is not. He says he can.

She asks if he can pick his nose and he shows her can can put it in hsi own mouth, so she touches her nose with her tongue. She tells him that her friend says his kind are monsters and his mind flashes back...

North Africa 2241

where he and other humanoid animals carry massive weapons and spattered in blood.

The little girl breaks his reverie asking if he washes behind his ears, uncomfortable he asks where her mother is. She says across the street and she asks his name and says her name is Savannah. His name is Ebony.

She asks if he was a big baby...

North Africa 2224 at the HQ of MAPPO

where an African woman has a Cesarean section that kills her, giving birth to Ebony. He is put in a bubble with dozens of others to grow controlled by machines.

She asks if he goes home to Africa. He says its not his home and is not a place he wants to return to soon.

North Africa 2240

Ebony is boxing a massive humanoid warthog in a fight to the death as training.

The girl asks if he has a girl friend because he look like he needs one and she would like to be his if he wants.

West Africa 2243 U.S. Rehab

Ebony has tried to hang himself with a chain when a hippoman and a girl called Sahara come to his aid and discuss how after two years he's still finds it hard to deal with what he's seen and done.

The girl asks if he ever killed anyone and starts to draw on a sheet of paper.

North Africa 2241

A team of animal/human hybrids stalk the land and a skinny man throws a rock at Ebony that causes him no harm at all. He responds with a blast from his massive gun.

The girl finishes the drawing as Ebony says its late and he has work to do. She gives him the drawing as her mother busts out of the nail parlor and scream as her daughter to keep away from him. She grab her daughter and threatens to report him. Ebony looks on sadly saying "Nothing Changes Sahara" to himself. He looks at the drawing. Its him inside a heart with 'Don't forget to wash behind your ears'.
name: See The Elephant

description: Henry (Judge Dredd/Aliens) Flint delivers eight pages of all-out action as Hip Flask takes on the Croc Elijah Delaney above and below the waters of the Los Angeles canal! "SHOCK CROC" (by Starkings & Moritat; flip cover by Ian Churchill) Mouth Almighty Herman Strumm and his delectable sidekick, Rabbi, entertain satellite radio listeners when Elijah Delaney stops by Dogstar Radio to deliver an exclusive interview!
name: Behemoth and Leviathan/ Shock Croc

description:
Bob Saetta made the biggest mistake of his life by pissing off his brother, one of the biggest and most brutal crime bosses in New York City. This is the story of two brothers at war, wrapped in a special package of extreme language and hardcore violence. Join award winning writer GARTH ENNIS (PREACHER, THE PUNISHER), JIMMY PALMIOTTI(JONAH HEX, PAINKILLER JANE) and artist MIHAILO VUKELIC on a five-issue adrenaline ride that rips the roof off Brooklyn’s criminal underworld!

SPOILERS

Bob Saetta walks into a police plaza in hopes of telling them everything he knows. And thats where everything goes down hill. When the police first attempt at taking down their targets fails, Bob decides to go in alone back to brooklyn to get his wife an son. After making his proposal very clear an the police contemplate letting Bob go they decide to allow him back to Brooklyn to find his wife an son. He takes care of a few thugs ith a shotgun an a bucket...yes a bucket. After finishing his "job" at the poker table heis told by one of the slowly dying goons "Dont kill the girl." an as soon as he is told he turns to find himself face to face with someone from his past Maggie. The inevitable blood bath is walking straight into Bob.
name: Friday

description: 'LOCAL HIPPO' Just getting home with his groceries proves to be a major task for Hip Flask, still on crutches after his run-in with Elijah Delaney. Meantime, Serengheti sends The Silencer out in search of a former employee in 'SILENT RUNNING' which features a flip cover by V FOR VENDETTA's DAVID LLOYD.
name: Localn Hoppo/ silent Running

description: The announcement of the marriage of Obadiah Horn to Sahara sparks a firestorm of controversy, and even their appearance on LIFE's morning show seems destined to end in disaster. 'THE LAST THING I REMEMBER' story RICHARD STARKINGS art DAVID HINE & ROB STEEN Nikken's determination to create new life means that innocent African women must surrender their own lives; willingly or unwillingly.
name: Abandoned by God/ The Last Thing I remember

description: 'MOXA CAUTERY' Ebony Hide and Hip Flask accompany the LAPD's Lieutenant Trench to the scene of Ebony's recent encounter with Serengheti, and within minutes both of them are wishing they'd stayed in their hospital beds. Plus, 'MONKEY BUSINESS' by JILL FRESHNEY and ROB 'FLANIMALS' STEEN.
name: Moxa Cautery/ Monkey Business

description: 'UNICORN' Underneath a veneer of success and celebrity, Obadiah Horn believes himself to be more animal than man. Forced to hide this side of himself from his human consort, Sahara, he is nevertheless aware that she is the only one that understands the war that rages inside him and can perhaps save him from himself. But in all wars, there must be casualties.
name: Unicorn
